environment.INVIDIOUS_CONFIG:
channel_threads: 1
check_tables: true
feed_threads: 1
db:
  user: kemal
  password: kemal
  host: srv-captain--$$cap_appname-db
  port: 5432
  dbname: invidious
full_refresh: false
https_only: false
domain:

variables.label: Invidious Version
variables.description: Check out their Quay.io page for the valid tags https://quay.io/repository/invidious/invidious?tab=tags. If you want to use the latest tag (or a versioned release, if available), start with a colon (e.g. :latest).

variables.label: Postgres Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres?tab=tags

instructions.start:
Invidious is an alternative front-end to YouTube. 
More details: https://github.com/iv-org/invidious
instructions.end: Invidious has been successfully deployed! It may take a couple of minutes until the web frontend can be reached.

description: Invidious is an alternative front-end to YouTube.
